channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #61 – Hanging Out With City Birds’ Developer, Noah Malewicz

item.title: By: Mo
item.dc:creator: Mo
item.description:
By the way, would love if you could talk more about the way you setup your challenges in the game. I loved your answer in the show but I need more :)
GREAT JOB on the game.
Mo
item.content:encoded:
By the way, would love if you could talk more about the way you setup your challenges in the game. I loved your answer in the show but I need more ðŸ™‚

GREAT JOB on the game.

Mo

item.title: By: Mo
item.dc:creator: Mo
item.description:
Hey Noah, great show today. Thank you answering all the questions I had! For you and people who have problem with the review button in your app, Scott Aldeman provided me this link (Thanks Scott!) where you can generate a direct link to your app in the appstore (IOS) Make sure to select apps in the menu.
http://linkmaker.itunes.apple.com/us/
I think you can then use the link and use the same way you did as before (below ios 7)
I am going to update my app that way and see. Right now, it seems that people who try to review my app cannot because the link has changed.
Hope this help.
MO
item.content:encoded:
Hey Noah, great show today. Thank you answering all the questions I had! For you and people who have problem with the review button in your app, Scott Aldeman provided me this link (Thanks Scott!) where you can generate a direct link to your app in the appstore (IOS) Make sure to select apps in the menu.

http://linkmaker.itunes.apple.com/us/

I think you can then use the link and use the same way you did as before (below ios 7)

I am going to update my app that way and see. Right now, it seems that people who try to review my app cannot because the link has changed.

Hope this help.

MO
